html:
this is not what he intends. Assyria's king does not know that he is being used as the Lord's instrument to punish Israel. His intent is to conquer the earth and to gain glory and riches for himself.

in his heart it is to destroy. Assyria's king intends to destroy and murder the inhabitants of many nations. It was never his purpose to fulfill the will of the Lord in punishing Israel for their many transgressions.

cut off nations not a few. Assyria's goal was to war against and conquer the world.
